front.title: Additional RPC definitions to Generic YANG Data Model for layer Independent OAM Management

abstract.t: [I-D.tissa-lime-yang-oam-model] defines a Generic YANG data model for Layer independent OAM Management. This document proposes additional extension to this YANG module which is complementary to the one defined in the [I-D.tissa-lime-yang-oam-model] and describes the abstract notification and rpc command for Unified Management Plane OAM to be used within IETF in a layer independent manner. The abstract notification and rpc command described in this document can be applied to various network technologies and includes technology independent configuration data and state data.
